abstract_ssm: This collection consists of photographs, programs, and certificates relating to Ruth S. Harley's time as a student at Erasmus Hall High School, as well as an Erasmus Hall songbook and history. Additional items include photographs of Ruth S. Harley as a student at Public School 139 and the Cortelyou School, photographs of Jeanette H. and Robert Harley, and photocopies of Walter Harley's obituary. Items date from 1908 to 1959.
subject_ssm: Girls |x Education |z New York (State) |z Kings County
